name: Mr.Handy
description:
One hand - Three superpowers Shoot, teleport and slo-mo in order to kill evil bosses!

Mr.Handy is a game made by the 2Weeks team. It's a top-down shooter featuring 3 levels of tutorial to familiarize the player with the each superpower, and 2 boss fights.  Watch out for the middle finger.....

All assets were created by the team.
